verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> vials <S%G5357><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> talked <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Come hither <S%G1204><s%>; I will shew <S%G1166><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> whore <S%G4204><s%> that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%>:

With <S%G3326><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have committed fornication <S%G4203><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the inhabitants <S%G2730><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have been made drunk <S%G3184><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>.

So <S%G2532><s%> he carried <S%G667><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> away <S%G667><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> sit <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> a scarlet coloured <S%G2847><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%>, full of <S%G1073><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> of blasphemy <S%G988><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in purple <S%G4209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scarlet colour <S%G2847><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> decked <S%G5558><s%> with gold <S%G5557><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pearls <S%G3135><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> full of <S%G1073><s%> abominations <S%G946><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> filthiness <S%G168><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> her <S%G846><s%> forehead <S%G3359><s%> was a name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, MYSTERY <S%G3466><s%>, BABYLON <S%G897><s%> THE GREAT <S%G3173><s%>, THE MOTHER <S%G3384><s%> OF HARLOTS <S%G4204><s%> AND <S%G2532><s%> ABOMINATIONS <S%G946><s%> OF THE EARTH <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> drunken <S%G3184><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the martyrs <S%G3144><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when I saw <S%G1492><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, I wondered <S%G2296><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> admiration <S%G2295><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Wherefore <S%G1302><s%> didst thou marvel <S%G2296><s%>? I <S%G1473><s%> will tell <S%G2046><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the woman <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> that carrieth <S%G941><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%>.

The beast <S%G2342><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> was <S%G2258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> ascend <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the bottomless pit <S%G12><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> perdition <S%G684><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall wonder <S%G2296><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> were <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, when they behold <S%G991><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that was <S%G3748><s%> <S%G2258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, and yet <S%G2539><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>.

And here <S%G5602><s%> is the mind <S%G3563><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>. The seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> mountains <S%G3735><s%>, on <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G846><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> sitteth <S%G2521><s%> <S%G3699><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>: five <S%G4002><s%> are fallen <S%G4098><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, and the other <S%G243><s%> is <S%G2064><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he cometh <S%G2064><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> a short space <S%G3641><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the eighth <S%G3590><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> goeth <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> perdition <S%G684><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> have received <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3768><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> as yet <S%G3768><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> mind <S%G1106><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall give <S%G1239><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strength <S%G1849><s%> unto the beast <S%G2342><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> shall make war <S%G4170><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> shall overcome <S%G3528><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of lords <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of kings <S%G935><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they that are with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are called <S%G2822><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, The waters <S%G5204><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> the whore <S%G4204><s%> sitteth <S%G2521><s%>, are <S%G1526><s%> peoples <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>, these <S%G3778><s%> shall hate <S%G3404><s%> the whore <S%G4204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall make <S%G4160><s%> her <S%G846><s%> desolate <S%G2049><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall eat <S%G5315><s%> her <S%G846><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> burn <S%G2618><s%> her <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath put <S%G1325><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> to fulfil <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G1106><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to agree <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3391><s%> <S%G1106><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> their <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> unto the beast <S%G2342><s%>, until <S%G891><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall be fulfilled <S%G5055><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> that great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> reigneth <S%G2192><s%> <S%G932><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.
